title: Stay at 5 stars hotels in Hoi An for your holiday
text:
Travel Articles | October 4, 2015 
Well-placed in the shopping, culture, sightseeing area of Hoi An city, 5 stars hotels provides a most conducive spot for you to take a break from your busy days. 
Conveniently situated in Hoi An, La Residencia Hoian Luxury Boutique Hotel is just 300 metres from the renowned Hoi An Ancient Town and Hoi An Market. Japanese Covered Bridge is 600 metres away, while Da Nang Airport is accessible within a 30 km drive. This newly built hotel offers modern and elegant accommodation with free WiFi access in the entire property. It features an indoor pool, a fully-equipped gym and business centre. La Residencia Hotel & Spa is the luxury boutique designed suites hotel with 50 suites including 10 Residencia Suites, 38 Junior Suites and 2 Connecting, with panoramic views over Hoai River or Ancient Town of Hoian, for added tranquility, the courtyard. The rooms are fully soundproofed, offer free connection to the Internet over Wi-fi and feature bathrooms decorated in marble. Palm Garden Beach Resort & Spa has a total of 188 well-decorated rooms that vary from standard to suite rooms. Out of the rooms, there are twenty (20) bungalows, 14 of which are located on the beach, facing the ocean while the other 6 are located on the beautiful garden setting. All of the bungalows are well-designed with open-air bathtubs. The luxury resort also has three (3) Junior Suites and 1 Palm Garden Suite, located at a private area. These types of room are best suited for those who are traveling with a big family where they can get to have their own private paradise. Perfectly positioned along the popular Cua Dai Beach, Sunrise Hoi An Beach Resort offers enchanting views to one of the most stunning coastlines in the world. Boasting 222 rooms, suites and beachfront villas in Sunrise Hoi An Beach, guests are pampered with all the residential touches of home, while providing a lavish escape to beachfront elegance. The Nam Hai complements resort living with cultural attractions that reflect the true spirit of Indochina. In keeping with GHM Hotel's tradition to providing guests a culturally inviting experience, The Nam Hai Hoi An stands for all the charms of true Vietnamese hospitality. All guest accommodations feature thoughtful amenities to ensure an unparalleled sense of comfort. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Hotel Royal Hoi An Mgallery Collection Vietnam is best luxury 5 star resort with discount rates on hotels-in-vietnam. Step into one of 6 inviting rooms and escape the stresses of the day with a wide range of amenities such as internet access, private pool, non smoking rooms, air conditioning which can be found in some rooms. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Montgomerie Links Villas Hoi An is your one-stop destination for quality hotel accommodations in Hoi An.
